title: Power Rangers (film)
summary: Power Rangers (also marketed as Saban's Power Rangers)[5] is a 2017 American superhero film based on the franchise of the same name, directed by Dean Israelite and written by John Gatins. It is the third installment in the Power Rangers film series, and is a reboot that loosely adapts the showâ€™s pilot episode. The film features the main characters of the Mighty Morphin Power Rangers television series with a new cast, starring Dacre Montgomery, Naomi Scott, RJ Cyler, Becky G, Ludi Lin, David Denman, featuring  Bill Hader, with Bryan Cranston, and Elizabeth Banks.
